title: Fast
author: gaplong
aiHeadline: Catherine Jue's 'Fast' website is so blazingly quick, it might just make you question the purpose of your own existence while waiting for your slow website to load.

title: ‘No Other Land’ consultant Awdah Hathaleen killed by Israeli settler
author: _shadi
aiHeadline: Palestinian activist Awdah Hathaleen, who consulted on 'No Other Land,' was tragically killed by an Israeli settler, proving once again that the Middle East is a region where everyone wins except for the people who get killed.

title: Our $100M Series B
author: spatulon
aiHeadline: Oxide Computer raises a whopping $100 million in Series B funding, which is great news for everyone except the people who didn't invest, because now they'll just have to deal with the guilt of not being millionaires too.

title: Sleep all comes down to the mitochondria
author: A_D_E_P_T
aiHeadline: Scientists discover that sleep all comes down to the mitochondria, which is a relief because now we can finally stop blaming ourselves for our inability to get a good night's sleep and instead blame tiny organelles in our cells.

title: Try the Mosquito Bucket of Death
author: almuhalil
aiHeadline: Energy Vanguard challenges you to 'Try the Mosquito Bucket of Death,' which sounds like a fun and exciting way to deal with mosquitoes, unless you're a mosquito, in which case it sounds like a nightmare.
